title: Adventures of Red Ryder 1940 colorized cliffhanger serial (Don 'Red' Barry)

sources.title: Adventures Of Red Ryder
sources.description: A conniving banker plans to drive ranchers from their land so as to profit from the forthcoming railroad. But when his father is killed by one of the banker's gang, and his aunt is about to have her ranch taken over, Red Ryder swears revenge and sets out to bring them all to justice, with help from his friends Cherokee Sims and Little Beaver. Based on the newspaper comic strip by Fred Harmon. 12 chapters. Don 'Red' Barry as Red Ryder Noah Beery as Ace Hanlon Tommy Cook as Little Beaver Maude Allen as Duchess Ryder Vivian Austin as Beth Andrews Harry Worth as Calvin Drake Hal Taliaferro as Cherokee Sims William Farnum as Col. Tom Ryder Bob Kortman as One-Eye Chapin Carleton Young as Sheriff Dade Ray Teal as Shark I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
